languages.text: "Но, {name}..." {n}Голубоватый туман окутывает фигуру Кассии. "Успокаивается", — неожиданно ясно понимаете вы.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Но {name}..." {n}Голубоватый туман окутывает фигуру Кассии. "Успокаивается", — неожиданно ясно понимаете вы.{/n}
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "But {name}..." {n}A blueish haze blankets Cassia's figure. "She is calming down," you suddenly realise with clarity.{/n}

languages.text: “可是，{name}……”{n}卡西娅的身上落下了一层蓝色的薄雾。她冷静下来了——你突然清楚地理解了这种颜色的含义。{/n}
languages.original_text: "But {name}..." {n}A blueish haze blankets Cassia's figure. "She is calming down," you suddenly realise with clarity.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “可是，{name}……”{n}卡西娅的身上落下了一层蓝色的薄雾。她冷静下来了——你突然清楚地理解了这种颜色的含义。{/n}
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Aber {name} ..." {n}Ein bläulicher Nebel legt sich über Cassias Gestalt. "Sie beruhigt sich", erkennst du mit plötzlicher Klarheit.{/n}
languages.original_text: "But {name}..." {n}A blueish haze blankets Cassia's figure. "She is calming down," you suddenly realise with clarity.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Aber {name} ..." {n}Ein bläulicher Nebel legt sich über Cassias Gestalt. "Sie beruhigt sich", erkennst du mit plötzlicher Klarheit.{/n}
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: « Mais {name}... » {n}Une brume bleuâtre recouvre la silhouette de Cassia. « Elle se calme », réalisez-vous soudain avec clarté.{/n}
languages.original_text: "But {name}..." {n}A blueish haze blankets Cassia's figure. "She is calming down," you suddenly realise with clarity.{/n}

languages.text: «Pero {name}...». {n}Una neblina azulada cubre la figura de Cassia. Te das cuenta de que se está calmando.{/n}
languages.original_text: "But {name}..." {n}A blueish haze blankets Cassia's figure. "She is calming down," you suddenly realise with clarity.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Pero {name}...». {n}Una neblina azulada cubre la figura de Cassia. Te das cuenta de que se está calmando.{/n}

languages.text: 「でも、{name}様…」{n}青みがかったもやが、カシアの体を包む。「彼女は落ち着いてきている」あなたは突然、はっきりとそう認識する。{/n}
languages.original_text: "But {name}..." {n}A blueish haze blankets Cassia's figure. "She is calming down," you suddenly realise with clarity.{/n}
